name: theITSupportCenter
title: Senior CTA & dCTA
bullets: Managed 1.2K+ tech support issues for 30+ clients (e.g. Department of Defense, Shipping, Industrial). Within a 15-35 minutes support engagement, I understood the issue, analyzed root causes, and then troubleshooted to resolution. Current results are a 9.8 out of 10 QAS rating (top 5% in the company with a standard 9.2 benchmark).
Authored and updated current Knowledge Base articles to increase our response time to support issues.
Consulted and mentoring other CTAs on a wide range of tech issues and company processes.

name: theITSupportCenter
title: dCTA
bullets: Spearheaded the Dedicated Support position, providing support to one specific $500mil+ client on their SaaS product.

Through continual learning, communicating with key stakeholders over support issues, and identifying, authoring, and updating Knowledge Base articles, the team and I were able to reduce time to resolution by almost 20%.
Regularly communicated with my company director as well as client manager about the needs and effectiveness of our ongoing support.

name: theITSupportCenter
title: CTA
bullets: Advised and resolved customer issues through phone or email support.
Researched and implemented solutions and workarounds to a variety of unique problems.
Continually learned and trained on a variety of technical and software packages for companies
Educated customers on the issues they are facing and potential steps to resolve them in the future.
